verbs.description: [ARG1: son of owner of limo in deadly crash] [V: taken] [ARGM-DIR: into custody] the son of the owner of limousine company in the deadly crash that killed 20 people on saturday was taken into custody wednesday by state police his lawyer confirmed albany state police shahed hussain saratoga county nauman hussain
